solution_line_template: The first tree gives him {red_apples_first_tree} red apples because {total_apples_per_tree} x {first_tree_red_percent_decimal} = <<{total_apples_per_tree}*{first_tree_red_percent_decimal}={red_apples_first_tree}>>{red_apples_first_tree}

The second tree gives him {red_apples_second_tree} red apples because {total_apples_per_tree} x {second_tree_red_percent_decimal} = <<{total_apples_per_tree}*{second_tree_red_percent_decimal}={red_apples_second_tree}>>{red_apples_second_tree}
